sentences.en: A Good. Can we check dates? I'll just get my diary.
sentences.cn: A好. 我们能查看一下日期 吗 ?我就把我的日志拿来.

sentences.en: According to my diary, I've got two meetings on Monday.
sentences.cn: 根据我在记事本上的记录, 周一我要开两个会.

sentences.en: At 18, Vicky read the famous " cycling diary " of Hu Rong - hua.
sentences.cn: 18岁时, 林姬莹 读了胡荣华的那本名著《单骑走天涯》.

sentences.en: But lacking effective marketing strategy - sized and small - scale diary enterprises must face challenge.
sentences.cn: 而 中小型 乳品企业在这一机遇面前显得力不从心,缺乏行之有效的营销策略.

sentences.en: For whom, It'suddenly occurred to him to wonder , was he writing this diary?
sentences.cn: 猛然间, 他又是一阵纳罕: 这是给谁写 呀 ?

sentences.en: He flipped the pages of the diary and began reading the last entry.
sentences.cn: 他快速翻了一下那本日志，然后开始读最后一篇。

sentences.en: He scribbled an appointment for 10.30 in his desk diary.
sentences.cn: 他在工作日志台历上匆匆写下十点三十分有约会.

sentences.en: I'll make a note of our next meeting in my diary.
sentences.cn: 我将把下次会议的事记在我的记事簿上。

sentences.en: Inge kept a diary (= wrote in a diary ) during the war years.
sentences.cn: 英奇在战争年代里一直写日记。

sentences.en: Mr Wilson's diary is booked up for months ahead.
sentences.cn: 威尔逊先生后几个月的日程都已经排满了。

sentences.en: Oh, well, wait a minute. Let me look in my diary.
sentences.cn: 嗯, 好的. 等一下,让我查一查我的日程安排.

sentences.en: Tell her I've got a window in my diary later on this week.
sentences.cn: 告诉她我这周晚些时候有空儿。

sentences.en: That's very kind of you. I'll just check my diary.
sentences.cn: 太好了, 我得看看我的日程安排.

sentences.en: The diary of reforms planned for the coming months is certainly full.
sentences.cn: 这个星期萨科齐先生在电视播送的新年献辞中讲到.

sentences.en: The prohibited foods include sugar, fats, diary foods, bananas, grapes, and meat.
sentences.cn: 忌口的食物包括糖, 脂肪, 乳制品, 香蕉, 葡萄和肉类.

sentences.en: They prefer to break another great unspoken rule - reading their partner's diary.
sentences.cn: 对方说的话也不一定安全,很多受访者承认曾偷听过对方的“秘密 ” 谈话.

trans.tran_en: a book in which you write down the things that happen to you each day
a book in which you write down the things that happen to you each day
